SummaryEnglish: A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to becomes "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.
Aliases: バックストリートガールズ

1.TitleEnglish: We Became Idols / Boss! Sensei Producer! / Bittersweet Memories / He Understands / Down With The Yakuza
1.SummaryEnglish: Forced to surgically alter their bodies into girls, three Yakuza brothers debut on the underground J-Pop idol scene after a year of intense training.

2.TitleEnglish: But... / Unthinkable / The Trick to Talk Shows / What's Girl Talk? / Do You Love Each Other?
2.SummaryEnglish: Junior Yakuza member Kimura becomes the idol unit's personal assistant. Boss Inugane books a live radio interview to promote the Gokudols.

3.TitleEnglish: Girl Master / Star of the Silver Screen / Redoing / Fourth Man / Idol at the Trail
3.SummaryEnglish: The Gokudols are sent to audition for a Yakuza movie. Mari and Chika visit their fathers for the first time since their transformations.

4.TitleEnglish: Secret of Gokudols / live legend / super love / soul food / scratch / grudge
4.SummaryEnglish: Chika sees her former lover in the audience of one of their performances. The Gokudols visit a local old-fashioned café for a television appearance.

5.TitleEnglish: Glory free winner / Fall in love / Japanese dream / Don and boss / Family bond / Gokudolls victim meeting
5.SummaryEnglish: After hearing of blood brother Inugane's lucrative idol business, the New York mafia boss Steve sends one of his own members to join the Gokudols.

6.TitleEnglish: Worker, unite! / Showdown Baba / Pigeon / Honesty / Couples Zenya / Five Devils
6.SummaryEnglish: The overworked girls inform Boss Inugane that they're too tired to perform. An influential enka singer insults the Gokudols during a live radio show.

7.TitleEnglish: Nirvana / Something important / Parent's teachings / Big Rookie / High school girl / Senpai and Kouhai
7.SummaryEnglish: The Gokudols must share the theater stage with an actual high school girl after Boss Inugane allows her to join the idol unit as their understudy.

8.TitleEnglish: Hidden Camera / Taking Courage / Shall We Dance or Revenge / Interview / Lower Body Exercise / Beard and Bust
8.SummaryEnglish: With enka singer Natsuko's financial backing, the men and women whose lives were ruined by the Gokudols cast their own idol unit to take them head-on.

9.TitleEnglish: Change of Group / My Angel / It's Amazing!! / Miserable... / With a Musical Instrument / Amazingly Breathtaking / Coverage
9.SummaryEnglish: While dejected that the fans are unresponsive to her efforts, understudy Yui informs Boss Inugane that another talent agency has recruited her.

10.TitleEnglish: Soul of Yakuza / Came to Nothing / Hell-p Me! / Graduation / Step-Up / The Last Time...
10.SummaryEnglish: Tired of berating the Gokudols for their lack of showmanship, Boss Inugane gives them a surprising ultimatum that will alter the idol unit's future.
